channel.title: Github on Finally, William started his blog?

item.title: How I Made This Blog - Part 2
item.description: Intro Want to make a website with Hugo, just like this one? In this post, I’ll outline how I did it, step by step. Step 0: Conquer your procrastination This step took me a while. Try not to get distracted, and remember that if you don’t have time for something, you make time for it. Stop right there!! Step 1: Choose a static site generator and a theme As mentioned in the previous post, I wanted a static site generator that could create blazingly fast websites.
